forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning light rain. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
